ygData.subject: RE: Short Sword of Ykesha spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: well i am an old-timer and i always remember needing a cleric.  but every story everyone says they don t need a healer, guess who they mention as being in
ygData.messageBody:
well i am an old-timer and i always remember needing a cleric. but every
story everyone says they don't need a healer, guess who they mention as
being in their group? an enchanter, of course hehe. they make most tough
situations doable.

Shada

> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> Last night I did bugs/bats in SolB with no healer whatsoever.
> Best experience I've gotten in a long time. 2 noxs, 1 death
> beetle, and no show on guano or stone. At one point we had
> 3 bats and 2 ldcs. A group with a healer would have fled,
> but this group finished all the battles at full hp. How?
>
> 2 paladins, 1 enchanter, 1 bard, 1 monk, 1 wizard.
>
> Enchanter does her thing, per usual. AE mez, AE stun.
